name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 10 in 1 Stick Vacuum with Powerful Suction, Hose, Green LED Light, Anti-Tangle Brush, Lightweight Rechargeable Vacuum Cleaner for Home, Hardwood Floors, Carpets
short_description: Unmatched Suction Power for Spotless Floors: Experience superior cleaning with powerful suction power that delivers 99.98% cleaning efficiency on hardwood floors, tiles, and more. With 3 customizable suction modes, this cordless vacuum adapts to any mess—whether it’s everyday dust or stubborn debris.

Lightweight & Versatile: Clean Anywhere, Anytime. Weighing just 2.9 pounds (main body), the cordless vacuum is designed for effortless cleaning without straining your back. Its 10-in-1 multifunctional design includes a hose, 2-in-1 brush, sofa brush, and crevice tool, making it perfect for floors, curtains, car seats, and even hard-to-reach cobwebs. Switch to handheld mode in seconds for ultimate convenience!

Upgraded Extra-Long Hose: The cordless vacuum whit 29-inch flexible hose is perfect for reaching challenging areas, including dryer vents and outdoor exhausts. Say goodbye to clogs and potential hazards with this enhanced feature, designed to keep your home safe and appliances running efficiently.

Smart LED Display & User-Friendly Controls: Stay in control with the easy-to-read LED screen, which shows real-time status updates. The intuitive physical buttons and suction adjustments prevent accidental changes, making your cleaning routine smoother and more efficient.

Advanced Green Light & Anti-Tangle Brush: The V-shaped anti-tangle floor brush effortlessly lifts embedded dirt and pet hair from carpets and hard floors, while the 270° rotating brush head ensures no spot is missed. The green LED light reveals hidden dirt for a deeper, more thorough clean compared to traditional white LEDs.

Cleaner Air for Your Family & Pets: With 99.97% 6-stage filtration, this vacuum traps fine dust and garbage, releasing only clean air back into your home. Perfect for families with kids and pets, it ensures a healthier living environment by preventing re-pollution.
Worry-Free After Sales: Each OIRFND cordless vacuum cleaner comes with 24-month protection plan and 24/7 customer service. If you encounter any problems, please contact us via message or email.

name: qimedo Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 35kPa Brushless Lightweight Stick Vacuum with 3 Mode Suction, 6 in 1 Stick Vacuum Cleaner with HEPA for Floor, Carpet, Car
short_description: Powerful Brushless Motor – Equipped with a high-performance brushless motor, this cordless vacuum delivers an impressive 35KPA suction power with three adjustable modes. The motor spins at 120,000 RPM, providing deep cleaning efficiency for carpets, hardwood floors, and more.

Advanced Multi-Cyclone Filtration System – Featuring a multi-cone, multi-cyclonic filtration system, this vacuum effectively separates dust and debris while preventing clogs. The high-efficiency filter ensures long-term durability and maintains strong suction performance over time.

Advanced Multi-Cyclone Filtration System – Featuring a multi-cone, multi-cyclonic filtration system, this vacuum effectively separates dust and debris while preventing clogs. The high-efficiency filter ensures long-term durability and maintains strong suction performance over time.

Deep Cleaning Performance – Engineered with powerful suction and advanced separation technology, this vacuum penetrates deep into carpets and effortlessly removes dirt, dust, and pet hair from all types of flooring, including hardwood, tile, and rugs.

LED Floor Brush with Flexible Maneuverability – The motorized floor brush comes with built-in LED lights, making it easy to spot hidden dust and debris. The head rotates 90° vertically and 180° horizontally, allowing you to clean under furniture effortlessly without bending over.
product_description: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for Dewalt 20v Battery, 35kPa Brushless Lightweight Stick Vacuum with 3 Mode Suction, 6 in 1 Stick Vacuum Cleaner with HEPA for Floor, Carpet, Car (Battery Not Included)

name: Dyson V11 Origin Cordless Vacuum, Nickel/Blue
short_description: 1 Motorbar cleaner head and 3 attachments to clean up high, down low, and everywhere in between. Plus wall dock and charger.
Versatile and cordless for whole-home deep cleaning.
60% more power.¹ Up to 60 minutes of run time.²

Three power modes. Auto mode for everyday cleaning tasks—the optimal balance of power and run time to preserve the lifespan of your battery. Eco mode for maximum run time. Boost mode for intensive spot cleaning.
LCD screen shows power modes, maintenance alerts, and remaining run time to the second.
Motorbar cleaner head deep cleans all floor types. De-tangles wrapped long hair and pet hair as you clean.
Converts to a handheld vacuum for cleaning cars, stairs, and upholstery.
The Hair screw tool sucks up long hair and pet hair. Fast. Its anti-tangle conical brush bar removes long hair and pet hair from pet beds, car seats, stairs, and more.
Advanced whole-machine filtration traps 99.99% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.³ Expels cleaner air.

Made from strong materials selected for their durability and lightweight properties. With a 2-year limited warranty and lifetime Dyson support. Register your machine on the MyDyson app for personalized machine guides, maintenance and support.

name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 8-in-1 Powerful Stick Vacuum Cleaners For Home With 35kPa, 35Mins Runtime, 1L Dustbin, Anti-Tangle Rechargeable Self-Standing Vac For Floor Carpet Pet Hair Hardwood Tile car
short_description: Pro Tip: For maximum 35kPa suction power and full 25-35min runtime, please fully charge the stick vacuum cleaner before first use (shipped at <30% for safety). After each use, rinse and air-dry the filter completely to maintain peak performance - especially important for pet hair and deep carpet cleaning

【POWERFUL 35kPa SUCTION FOR DEEP CLEANING】 – PRAVOLE cordless vacuum cleaner for home features dual-motor power, delivers 35kPa suction (25min, best for targeted deep cleaning, about 450 sq ft of high-traffic carpet areas) for carpets & pet hair & stubborn debris, and 28kPa in Standard Mode (35min, actual test) to clean 1000 sq ft of hard floors - perfect as a vacuum for carpet, hard floor and crumbs in apartments. Large home owners: Search 'Battery for PV-S56 Vacuum Cleaner' for spare battery options. Weighing only 2.9lbs(main body), this vacuum cleaner offers adjustable height (34.09"-54.72"), ensuring comfortable use for both kids and adults

【EFFICIENT FILTERING】 – PRAVOLE vacuum cleaner for home combines a precision filtration system: a stainless steel pre-filter to trap debris, HEPA-grade filter capturing 99.97% of dust/pet hair, air outlet filter blocking particles, dust cup separating fine dirt, and secondary mesh filter ensuring clean air. Includes 2 washable HEPA grade filters—both the dust cup and filters are rinseable (dry fully before reuse). Perfect for pet hair vacuum cleaners for home cleaning. Important: To prevent loss of suction, the filter should be cleaned at least every 3 weeks

【8-IN-1 VERSATILITY】 – Transform this cordless stick vacuum cleaner into a handheld cordless vacuum with 15kPa suction power (17-minute runtime in max mode) or 10kPa suction (20-minute runtime in standard mode) for car, stairs, floors, curtains, pet cushions, sofas, and tight spaces. apartment vacuum includes 2-in-1 brush + crevice tool. Works on tiles, hard floor vacuum, and dog hair vacuum needs. 1L extra-large dust cup minimizes interruptions during cleaning

【V-SHAPED ANTI-TANGLE BRUSH & ADJUSTABLE ANGLE】 – This cordless vacuum cleaner features a removable & washable 8.9" wide roller that resists hair wrap for hassle-free cleaning(with an additional anti-frizz hair hook), while the 90°flat/150°swivel head reaches under furniture easily. Self-standing design + 3 charging modes makes it a lightweight vacuum cleaner for home. Note: For maintenance, simply wipe the floor brush head with a damp paper towel, Please do not wash directly in water

【DETACHABLE BATTERY & WARRANTY】 – Features a rechargeable vacuum cordless with 4x2000mAh batteries (4hr charge). Built-in green LED headlights expose hidden debris—perfect for small spaces and dorms. Includes 1-year warranty on this cordless stick vacuum cleaners for home. Contact us for troubleshooting - we respond within 12 hours. Not covered: Normal wear & tear. Tip: Use the original charger to protect battery life, a clear "click" sound confirms correct battery installation
【QUIET OPERATION】 – PRAVOLE quiet wireless cordless vacuum with noise levels below 60dB, this floor vacuum cleaner is ideal for early mornings or pet-friendly home for deep cleaning

name: Bissell Cleanview XR Pet 300W Cordless Vacuum with Removable Battery, 3797V
short_description: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
60% MORE POWERFUL MOTOR THAN Shark IX141
UP TO 40 MINUTES* OF CORDLESS CLEANING. Move throughout your home without being tied to an outlet.
DEEP CLEANING FURBRUSH. Powerful pet hair pickup on upholstery, stairs, cars & more
REMOVABLE 24V MAX LITHIUM-ION BATTERY. Cordless convenience with three cleaning modes.
product_description: Clean up messes from floor to ceiling with the BISSELL® CleanView® XR Pet 300W cordless stick vacuum. This powerful cleaner comes with three powerful cleaning modes and a removable lithium-ion battery to make storage and charging a breeze. With up to 40 minutes1 of runtime and 40% more powerful motor than the Shark® WANDVAC®2, you’ll be able to clean more effectively and enjoy freedom from being plugged in. The CleanView® XR Pet vacuum easily converts into a handheld vacuum and comes with three specialized tools—including the all-new deep cleaning fur brush—designed to clean the small areas where dirt accumulates. Remove the floor nozzle to use the stick vac as an extension wand to tackle messes high and low throughout your home. Our swivel steering feature and LED headlights make it easy to find and clean where dirt loves to hide. When you’re done cleaning, the wall mount and charging station conveniently store the vacuum and its tools, and ensures your unit will be ready to go for your next clean. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear. *In standard mode using the hand vac. **Versus competitor’s WS 642 nominal wattage.

name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 450W/40KPA 55 Mins Stick Vacuum Cleaner with LED Touch Display, Lightweight Handheld Vacuum Cleaners for Home, Carpet, Pet Hair and Hardwood Floors
short_description: 【40KPa Powerful Suction】Built-in 450W brushless motor and 7x2500 mAh lithium-ion battery. The detachable battery vacuum cleaner can output an excellent suction power of up to 40 Kpa and achieve uninterrupted autonomous operation of 55 mins in eco mode, a full charge takes only 4 hours. With 40KPa powerful suction power, Fieety vacuum cleaners can easily remove dirt and debris from floors, and pet hair from carpets.

【LED Smart Panel Design】Fieety cordless stick vacuum cleaner built-in sensor, is easy to operate and shows various functions at a glance. You can visualize the status of the vacuum cleaner, such as suction mode, remaining power, and roller brush/filter. With the switch button, you can change between 3 cleaning modes.

【Deep Cleaning】The 2-in-1 anti-tangle brush roller of the cordless vacuum cleaner has both hard and soft bristles, suitable for floors and carpets. Not only does this brush roller effectively reduce hair tangles, it won't scratch your wood floors. Series 5's more powerful motorized floor brushes support edge cleaning.

【Humanised Design】 This stick vacuum cordless rechargeable is equipped with a 1.5L dust cup that improves cleaning efficiency, which can be emptied at the touch of a button. With a wall mount for storing your cordless vacuum cleaner accessories, keeping order has never been so easy. The ergonomically designed tilting screen makes reading easier.

【No Worry About After-sales】If you have any problems with your vacuum cleaner, please let us help. We offer a 24-month customer service and accessories replacement service. If you have any concerns, we are always here.

name: Coovy Cordless Vacuum Cleaner SU7, 580W 45Kpa 75 Minutes Runtime Stick Vacuum with Touch Screen, Anti-Tangle Wireless Powerful Lightweight Vac for Home Pet Hair Carpet Hardwood, Gold
short_description: Powerful 580W Brushless Motor & Smart Suction (45kPa Max): Our SU7 cordless vacuum cleaner delivers industry-leading 45kPa suction power. The smart suction system automatically adjusts power from 11-45kPa based on detected debris (25-45kPa in manual modes). Our 6-stage HEPA filtration system captures 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns

Extended 75-Minute Runtime: The removable 8x2500mAh batt provides up to 75 minutes of runtime in Eco mode (25kPa). The stick vacuum cleaner offers adaptive runtime options: 20-60 minutes (Auto), 40 minutes (Standard 35kPa), and 20 minutes (Max 45kPa). The system includes status alerts and low-power protection features

Interactive LED Touchscreen Dashboard: The touchscreen displays real-time information about battery life, suction mode, and error codes. Users can enjoy one-touch switching between Auto/Smart mode and 4 manual power levels. The dashboard provides cleaning analytics and maintenance reminders

V-Shaped Anti-Tangle Brush with Full Maneuverability: Our patented V-roller design prevents hair wrap (50% better than standard brushes). The brush head offers 180° lateral and 90° vertical swivel steering for under-furniture cleaning. Integrated LED headlights reveal hidden dust in dark spaces

Complete Cleaning System with 3 Specialized Attachments: You will receive crevice nozzle, 2-in-1 brush and sofa brush. The vacuum converts easily to handheld mode for cleaning stairs, cars, curtains, and delicate surfaces

All-Surface Cleaning Power: This high-performance vacuum effortlessly tackles dirt, dust, pet hair, and debris on hardwood, tile, carpets, rugs, and more—no surface is off-limits! Perfect for crumbs and stubborn messes, it delivers deep cleaning with every pass. Lightweight, powerful, and versatile—your go-to for a spotless home!
24/7 Premium Support with Quality Assurance: Our dedicated troubleshooting team provides round-the-clock assistance. The product comes with a 24-month service

name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Upgraded 580W 48KPA 65Mins Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner with Self-Standing and Touch Screen, Anti-tangle Wireless Vacumm, Vacuum Cleaners for Home/Pet Hair/Carpets/Floors
short_description: [48KPA Powerful Suction] Cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with a powerful 580W brushless motor with the strongest suction power up to 48,000Pa, which can easily capture dust, crumbs, pet hair and large particles on carpets, hardwood floors and tiles, and efficiently solve the cleaning problems.

[Max 65 Mins Running Time] Equipped with 8*2800mAh rechargeable battery pack, breaking the limitations of battery life and providing up to 65 minutes. X100 stick vacuum can complete the whole house cleaning of large households in one go, from living room to bedroom, study room to kitchen, without frequent charging, and the cleaning process is completed in one go!

[V-shaped anti-winding brush] V-shaped spiral brush with the guide comb design to form a "cutting+dredging" dual anti-entanglement system, whether it's stubborn hair clumps deep in the carpet or fine hairs in the floor crevices, can be quickly rolled into the dust cup, effectively solving the problem of entanglement common to traditional vacuum cleaners.

[Self-standing design] Vacuum cleaners for Home stands on its own , whether it is answering the phone in the middle, changing the cleaning area, or sorting out sundries, it can stands on its own anywhere without looking for a support point, and there is no need to worry about dust overflow or body collision damage caused by tilting and overturning of the vacuum cleaner.

[Smart Touch Screen] The top of the cordless stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with LED touch screen, which can adjust the suction by touching the screen, and can also check the battery life, dust cup fullness and filter maintenance at any time to enjoy intelligent cleaning.

name: BLACK+DECKER POWERSERIES+ 20V MAX Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner with LED Floor Lights, Lightweight, Multi-Surface (BHFEA520J) , Gray
short_description: Up to 25% more pickup on carpet**
Up to 44 minutes of runtime
AUTOSENSE technology: automatically changes suction power based on floor type, optimizing runtime
Cyclonic filtration helps keep your filter clean for optimum vacuum performance
Anti-tangle brush bar for easy hair pick-up + removal
Conveniently locate hidden dirt with LED floorhead lights
Compact storage: vacuum stands upright on its own with no leaning necessary
Quickly converts to A hand vacuum with a crevice tool for stairs, furniture, and hard-to-reach spaces
product_description: Tackle big messes and tidy your home with the POWERSERIES+ 20V MAX* Cordless Stick Vacuum. Designed for large spills, this vacuum offers up to 25% more pickup on carpets** and up to 44 minutes of runtime. Its advanced AUTOSENSE technology automatically adjusts suction power based on the floor type, while the cyclonic filtration system maintains a clean filter for optimal performance. The anti-tangle brush bar and integrated LED floorhead lights make picking up pet hair, fur, and debris easy. Easily convert it into a handheld vacuum with the crevice tool to clean stairs and furniture or lay it flat to reach under beds and couches. When you're finished, the vacuum's convenient self-standing capability makes storage simple.

name: Bissell PowerClean FurGuard 280W Self-Standing Cordless Vacuum w/Self-Cleaning Brush Roll, Strong Suction, Removeable Battery, Wall Mount, Upholstery Tool & Bright Headlights
short_description: NO PET HAIR LEFT BEHIND. Find & capture pet hair everywhere with a powerful 280W motor and our new FurFinder Headlights that illuminate hidden pet hair and fine dust and debris.
UP TO 50 MINUTES OF CORDLESS CLEANING POWER. Easily transform from a stick vacuum to a handheld or high-reach vacuum.
BETTER THAN THE COMPETITOR. Removes up to 95% of embedded pet hair 2x faster with FurFinder Tool on couches, chairs, stairs, auto interiors and more.
FURGUARD SELF-CLEANING BRUSHROLL. Prevent hair wrap and clogging on hair up to 16 inches long, and powerfully vacuum debris across multiple surfaces.
SELF-STANDING CONVENIENCE. PowerClean can stand on its own while charging the long-lasting battery and for pauses in between cleaning.
HEPA SEALED ALLERGEN SYSTEM. Helps capture dust and allergens inside the vacuum so they don't escape back into the air you breathe.
CLEAN MORE SPACES AND PLACES. Integrated Crevice Tool reaches into corners and crevices and FurFinder Tool attachment tackles embedded hair everywhere.
product_description: Pet parents can finally conquer embedded pet fur from upholstery and remove hidden debris across their homes with the BISSELL PowerClean® FurGuard™ 280W cordless stick vacuum. BISSELL®, America’s #1 brand purchased by pet owners†, scientifically engineered this cordless stick vac to be Pet Proven™ certified to expertly clean pet messes. This vacuum features a FurFinder™ tool to powerfully remove up to 95% of embedded pet fur from upholstery 2X faster than the competitive cordless stick vacuum1 . See 3X more pet fur with FurFinder™ Headlight Technology2, allowing you to find and pick up more fur. The 280W motor provides powerful cleaning on area rugs and hard surfaces. The HEPA Sealed Allergen System captures and contains dust and dander allergens from the air you breathe, and the self-clean Brush Roll prevents frustrating hair wrap. Every purchase makes it possible for BISSELL to continue our support of BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission of saving pets in need. Since 2011, BISSELL has donated over $26 million in support of BISSELL Pet Foundation®. When you purchase a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. Our products are engineered to clean even the toughest messes so pets can stay at home and out of shelters. 1 Using hand vac in eco mode 2 vs. Shark Pet Multi-Tool on Upholstery 3 On average vs. Shark IX141 by comparing images in a U.S. pet owner perception survey 4 vs. Shark IX141 based on 16” hair with continued cleaning for an average of 1 minute on carpet 5 tested per ASTM F1977 based on particles 0.3 microns and smaller †Source: Circana, LLC, Checkout Omni Panel Analytics, US, Based on % of Buyers, 12 Months Ending December 2024
